channel.title: +Godfather on Vishvas's English lit
channel.description: Recent content in +Godfather on Vishvas's English lit

item.description: THE GODFATHER Part Two Screenplay by Mario Puzo and Francis Ford Coppola SECOND DRAFT September 24, 1973 FADE IN: The Paramount Pictures logo is presented over a simple black background, as a single trumpet plays the familiar theme of a waltz. White lettering fades in: Mario Puzo's THE GODFATHER There is a pause, as the trumpet concludes, and there is the additional title: - Part Two - INT. DON CORLEONE’S OLD OFFICE - CLOSE VIEW ON MICHAEL CORLEONE - DAY
